title: User Access Request Workflow
description: A user requests access to a new application. The request must go through a formal approval workflow.

tasks.description: A user submits a request for access to the 'Tableau' application via the IGA portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system successfully receives the request.

tasks.description: The IGA tool automatically routes the request to the user's direct manager for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager receives an email notification to approve or deny the request.

tasks.description: Once the manager approves, the request is routed to the application owner for final approval before access is automatically provisioned.
tasks.expected_outcome: The multi-step approval workflow is followed correctly, ensuring proper governance before access is granted.
